```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.path = "man/figures/")
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(sccomp)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)
library(tidyr)
data("seurat_obj")
data("sce_obj")
data("counts_obj")
```

# Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("stemangiola/sccomp")
```

# Analysis

## From Seurat Object

```{r eval=FALSE}

res =
  seurat_obj |>
  sccomp_glm(~ type, sample, cell_group )

```

```{r eval=FALSE}
res =
  sce_obj |>
  sccomp_glm(~ type, sample, cell_group)

```

## From data.frame 

```{r eval=FALSE}

res =
  seurat_obj[[]] |>
  sccomp_glm(~ type, sample, cell_group )

```

## From counts (fast execution)

```{r warning=FALSE}

counts_obj |>
sccomp_glm( 
  ~ type, 
  sample, cell_group, count, 
  approximate_posterior_inference = TRUE, 
  check_outliers = FALSE,
  cores = 1
)

```
